title: Wholesale Price of Wheat for Berlin, Germany
notes:
Prices For The Years 1914-1923 Have Been Converted From Paper Marks To Gold Marks By NBER. Prices For 1924-1925 Were Originally Given For 50 Kilograms. Source: For 1879-1891, Monatshefte Zur Statistik De Deutschen Reichs; For 1892-1896, 1898-1920, And 1924-1935, Viertelsjahrhefte Zur Statistik Des Deutschen Reichs; For 1897, Statistisches Jahrbuch; And For 1921- 1923, Wirtschaft Und Statistik.

This NBER data series m04003 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 4 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter04.html.

NBER Indicator: m04003
